question: Is the sale / purchase of manure fertilizer permissible? Manure fertilizer is used for grass on a football field. The field is watered from time to time. Should I avoid playing in those areas until the fertilizer reduces to dust?
answer:
QUESTION

Is the sale / purchase of manure fertilizer permissible? Manure fertilizer is used for grass on a football field. The field is watered from time to time. Should I avoid playing in those areas until the fertilizer reduces to dust?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Â 

The sale/purchase of manure fertilizer is permissible. Avoiding those areas where manure has been put will not be necessary.

[Ahsanul Fatawaa v6 pg521]

And Allah knows best
